name: mig3
description: Detect regressions in your python3 migration!

HEROKU.description: When present, activates Heroku Django settings overrides.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Automatically populated by Heroku. Used to build a hostname.

HEROKU_PARENT_APP_NAME.description: Automatically populated by Heroku. Used to build a hostname.

SECRET_KEY.description: Django's secret key for cryptographic operations.

SECRET_URL_SALT.description: Extra salt used to sign the administrator bootstrap process.
